products.name: Oil Chiller - Water-Cooled Reciprocating
products.design: Reciprocating compressor chiller with shell-and-tube heat exchangers for oil cooling
products.applications: Hydraulic/lube/cutting oil cooling in industrial settings.
products.features: Purpose-built for oil circuits with precise temperature control. Robust operation and energy efficiency. Microprocessor control panels with precision temperature and pressure controls. Electronic expansion valves for precise refrigerant metering.
products.differentiator: Specifically designed for industrial oil cooling applications with materials compatible with various oil types. Can achieve very low temperatures (e.g., -50°C for brine) for specialized applications.

specifications.condenser: Water-cooled (shell and tube or fin & tube designs)
specifications.refrigerant: R404A, R407C, R-134a, Ammonia, CO2 (eco-friendly options)
specifications.operating_temperature_range: Can achieve very low temperatures (e.g., -50°C for brine), condensing temperatures up to 45°C
specifications.control_systems: Microprocessor control panels, precision temperature and pressure controls, electronic expansion valves

products.name: Air Oil Chiller
products.design: Air or water-cooled chiller with multiple compressor options for oil systems
products.applications: Oil systems where water is limited, hydraulic systems, lubrication systems, spindle cooling, CNC machines.
products.features: Broad compressor choice (scroll/reciprocating/screw) for flexibility. Rugged MS body construction. Precise temperature control and energy efficiency. Suitable for various operating fluids including mineral oils, synthetic oils, and water-glycol mixtures.
products.differentiator: Versatile solution with air or water cooling options, ideal for locations where cooling water is limited or unavailable. Compatible with wide range of industrial fluids and oils.

specifications.operating_fluids: Mineral oils, oil/water emulsions, water glycol, phosphate ester, synthetic oils, vegetable oils

products.name: Glycol / Brine Chillers
products.design: Low-temperature chiller with screw/scroll compressor for glycol or brine applications
products.applications: Food processing (breweries, dairy, meat), chemical plants, pharmaceuticals, cold storage facilities, ice production, and general industrial process cooling.
products.features: Low-temperature capability with glycol/brine fluids (-40°C to 5°C). Precise temperature control within ±1°C. Advanced control systems with connectivity options. Screw/scroll compressors with capacity control from 25% to 100%.
products.differentiator: Specialized for low-temperature applications where water-based chillers cannot operate. Shell and tube or plate heat exchangers with corrosion-resistant materials (316 stainless steel or titanium) for brine compatibility.

specifications.cooling_capacity: 1 KW to 2000 KW (or 1/2 HP to 300 HP)
specifications.evaporators: Shell and tube or plate heat exchangers (316 stainless steel or titanium for brine)

products.name: Medical Chillers (Copper/Brine type)
products.design: Medical-grade chiller with hermetically sealed or semi-hermetic screw/scroll compressors
products.applications: MRI/CT scanners, blood cooling, laboratories, and other healthcare applications requiring precise temperature control.
products.features: Customization for zero-downtime medical duty with redundant systems. Precise temperature control with microprocessor-based control systems. Robust construction with various safety mechanisms. Brine solution cooling for ultra-low temperature applications.
products.differentiator: Built to medical industry standards with enhanced reliability features for critical healthcare equipment. Temperature range from -40°C to +30°C (some models to -270°C for cryogenic applications). Designed for 24/7 operation with minimal maintenance requirements.

specifications.condenser: Water-cooled (plate type, shell and tube) or air-cooled
specifications.temperature_range: -40°C to +30°C (some models to -270°C for cryogenic applications)

products.name: Central/Industrial Cooling System
products.design: Engineered plant-wide cooling system with multiple chiller configurations
products.applications: Engineered plant-wide systems for large HVACR setups, industrial processes, and various commercial applications.
products.features: End-to-end supply and integration of complete cooling systems. Precise temperature control with robust operation. Energy efficiency across the system. Multiple chiller configurations (air-cooled, water-cooled, cooling tower, evaporative cooler, DX system, VRF/VRV, adiabatic cooling).
products.differentiator: Complete turnkey solution with design, supply, installation, and commissioning. Microprocessor control panels or PLC-based units with remote operation and data logging. Integrated approach ensures optimal system performance and energy efficiency.

specifications.system_types: Chiller (air-cooled, water-cooled), cooling tower, evaporative cooler, direct expansion (DX) system, VRF/VRV, adiabatic cooling
specifications.control_systems: Microprocessor control panels, PLC-based units with remote operation and data logging
specifications.refrigerant: R404A, R407C, R-134a, Ammonia, CO2 (eco-friendly options)
